data.enText: kept
kept

data.chText: 保持
data.enText: stay

data.chText: （使）保持，处于
data.enText: to stay in a particular condition or position; to make sb/sth do this

data.chText: 我们挤在一起来保暖。
data.enText: We huddled together to keep warm.

data.chText: 牌子上写着“勿践踏草地”。
data.enText: The notice said ‘Keep off (= Do not walk on) the grass’.

data.chText: 沿着墙靠左边走。
data.enText: Keep left along the wall.

data.chText: 她陪孩子们玩了好几个小时。
data.enText: She kept the children amused for hours.

data.chText: 他一直穿着大衣。
data.enText: He kept his coat on.

data.chText: 别跟我们卖关子了——然后发生了什么事儿？
data.enText: Don't keep us in suspense ─what happened next?

data.chText: 她保持平衡有困难。
data.enText: She had trouble keeping her balance .

data.chText: 对不起，让你久等了。
data.enText: I'm very sorry to keep you waiting .

data.chText: 继续
data.enText: continue

data.chText: 继续，重复（做某事）
data.enText: to continue doing sth; to do sth repeatedly

data.chText: 要保持笑容！
data.enText: Keep smiling!

data.chText: 别老是跟我打岔！
data.enText: Don't keep on interrupting me!

data.chText: 耽搁
data.enText: delay

data.chText: 使耽搁；使延误
data.enText: to delay sb

data.chText: 你晚了一小时——什么事把你给耽误了？
data.enText: You're an hour late─what kept you?

data.chText: 不退还
data.enText: not give back

data.chText: 保有；留着；不退还
data.enText: to continue to have sth and not give it back or throw it away

data.chText: 这是一张五元的钞票——零钱就不用找了。
data.enText: Here's a five dollar bill─please keep the change .

data.chText: 我把她所有的信都保留着。
data.enText: I keep all her letters.

data.chText: 为某人保留
data.enText: save for sb

data.chText: （为某人）保留，留下
data.enText: to save sth for sb

data.chText: 请给我留个座位。

data.hoverText: 动词+名词短语+名词短语

data.enText: Please keep a seat for me.

data.chText: 请给我留个座位。
data.enText: Please keep me a seat.

data.chText: 放；存放
data.enText: put/store

data.chText: 放，存放，贮存（在某处）
data.enText: to put or store sth in a particular place

data.chText: 把你的护照放在安全的地方。
data.enText: Keep your passport in a safe place.

data.chText: 商店；餐馆
data.enText: shop/restaurant

data.chText: 开设，经营，管理（商店或餐馆）
data.enText: to own and manage a shop/store or restaurant

data.chText: 她父亲开了个杂货店。
data.enText: Her father kept a grocer's shop.

data.chText: 动物
data.enText: animals

data.chText: 养；饲养
data.enText: to own and care for animals

data.chText: 养蜜蜂 / 山羊 / 母鸡
data.enText: to keep bees/goats/hens

data.chText: 健康
data.enText: about health

data.chText: （询问或谈论某人的健康）健康状况如何
data.enText: used to ask or talk about sb's health

data.chText: 你母亲身体好吗？
data.enText: How is your mother keeping ?

data.chText: 我们都很健康。
data.enText: We're all keeping well.

data.chText: 食物
data.enText: of food

data.chText: 保持不坏
data.enText: to remain in good condition

data.chText: 把馅饼都吃了吧——搁不住。
data.enText: Finish off the pie─it won't keep.

data.chText: “我很想听听，不过我已经晚了。”“好吧，我以后再告诉你。”
data.enText: ‘I'd love to hear about it, but I'm late already.’ ‘That's OK─ it'll keep (= I can tell you about it later) .

data.chText: 秘密
data.enText: secret

data.chText: 保守（秘密）
data.enText: to know sth and not tell it to anyone

data.chText: 你能保守秘密吗？
data.enText: Can you keep a secret?

data.chText: 她对我们所有人都避而不谈她的过去。
data.enText: She kept her past secret from us all.

data.chText: 承诺；约会
data.enText: promise/appointment

data.chText: 遵守；笃守；恪守
data.enText: to do what you have promised to do; to go where you have agreed to go

data.chText: 她遵守诺言去看望了他们。
data.enText: She kept her promise to visit them.

data.chText: 他未能按预约的时间去诊所。
data.enText: He failed to keep his appointment at the clinic.

data.chText: 日记；记录
data.enText: diary/record

texts: ~ a diary, an account, a record, etc.

data.chText: 记下，记录，记载（日记、账目、记录等）
data.enText: to write down sth as a record

data.chText: 她记了二十多年的日记。
data.enText: She kept a diary for over twenty years.

data.chText: 把每样物品的位置记录下来。
data.enText: Keep a note of where each item can be found.

data.chText: 供养
data.enText: support sb

data.chText: 供养；养活
data.enText: to provide what is necessary for sb to live; to support sb by paying for food, etc.

data.chText: 他挣的钱几乎不够养活他自己和家人。
data.enText: He scarcely earns enough to keep himself and his family.

data.chText: 保护
data.enText: protect

data.chText: 保护；使免受
data.enText: to protect sb from sth

data.chText: 愿上帝祝福你、保佑你（用于基督教的祈祷）。
data.enText: May the Lord bless you and keep you (= used in prayers in the Christian Church) .

data.chText: 他一心想的就是不要让这男孩受到伤害。
data.enText: His only thought was to keep the boy from harm.

data.chText: 体育运动
data.enText: in sport

data.chText: 守门；把守球门

before.enText: in football ( soccer ), hockey , cricket , etc.

data.enText: to guard or protect the goal or wicket

data.chText: 大多数含 keep 的习语，都可在该等习语中的名词及形容词相关词条找到，如 keep house 在词条 house 下。
data.enText: Most idioms containing keep are at the entries for the nouns and adjectives in the idioms, for example keep house is at house .
keep going

data.chText: （在身处困境或遭难时）尽力维持下去，坚持活下去
data.enText: to make an effort to live normally when you are in a difficult situation or when you have experienced great suffering

data.chText: 你只要让自己忙起来，就能坚持下去。
data.enText: You just have to keep yourself busy and keep going.

data.chText: （用于鼓励）继续下去，坚持下去
data.enText: used to encourage sb to continue doing sth

data.chText: 坚持下去，萨拉，你已经快到了。
data.enText: Keep going, Sarah, you're nearly there.
keep sb going

data.chText: 足以使某人维持（或支撑）
data.enText: to be enough for sb until they get what they are waiting for

data.chText: 吃个苹果就能挨到吃晚饭了。
data.enText: Have an apple to keep you going till dinner time.
keep sb after
keep at sth

data.chText: 继续做某事（或坚持干）
data.enText: to continue working at sth

data.chText: 快，要坚持，你马上就要完成了！
data.enText: Come on, keep at it, you've nearly finished!
keep sb at sth

data.chText: 使某人继续做（或坚持干）某事
data.enText: to make sb continue working at sth

data.chText: 他让我们不停地干了一天。
data.enText: He kept us at it all day.
keep away (from sb/sth)

data.chText: 避免接近；远离；勿靠近
data.enText: to avoid going near sb/sth

data.chText: 切莫靠近悬崖边。
data.enText: Keep away from the edge of the cliff.
keep sb/sth away (from sb/sth)

data.chText: 不让接近某人（或某事物）；使离开
data.enText: to prevent sb/sth from going somewhere

data.chText: 她病得好几周都上不了班。
data.enText: Her illness kept her away from work for several weeks.
keep back (from sb/sth)

data.chText: （与…）保持距离
data.enText: to stay at a distance from sb/sth

data.chText: 离公路远些。
data.enText: Keep well back from the road.
keep sb↔back
keep sb after

data.chText: 罚（学生）课后留校
data.enText: to make a student stay at school after normal hours as a punishment

data.chText: 使（学生）留级
data.enText: to make a student repeat a year at school because of poor marks/grades
keep sb↔back (from sb/sth)

data.chText: 使某人（与…）保持距离
data.enText: to make sb stay at a distance from sb/sth

data.chText: 设置了障碍，使人群无法靠近。
data.enText: Barricades were erected to keep back the crowds.
keep sth↔back

data.chText: 抑制（或阻止）感情等的流露
data.enText: to prevent a feeling, etc. from being expressed

data.chText: 她无法忍住泪水。
data.enText: She was unable to keep back her tears.

data.chText: 保留（或扣留）某物的一部分
data.enText: to continue to have a part of sth

data.chText: 他把那笔钱扣下了一半。
data.enText: He kept back half the money for himself.
keep sth↔back (from sb)

data.chText: 拒绝告知某事；隐瞒
data.enText: to refuse to tell sb sth

data.chText: 我肯定她有什么事瞒着我们。
data.enText: I'm sure she's keeping something back from us.
keep down

data.chText: 隐蔽；隐伏；卧倒；蹲下
data.enText: to hide yourself by not standing up straight

data.chText: 蹲下！一定不要让人看见你。
data.enText: Keep down! You mustn't let anyone see you.
keep sb↔down

data.chText: 压制（或限制、控制）某人
data.enText: to prevent a person, group, etc. from expressing themselves freely

data.chText: 多年来人们一直受到残暴统治的压制。
data.enText: The people have been kept down for years by a brutal regime.
keep sth↔down

data.chText: 使保持在低水平；抑制某事物的增长
data.enText: to make sth stay at a low level; to avoid increasing sth

data.chText: 保持低工资 / 物价 / 生活费用
data.enText: to keep down wages/prices/the cost of living

data.chText: 小声点——别让人听见。
data.enText: Keep your voice down─I don't want anyone else to hear.

data.chText: 小声点儿。
data.enText: Keep the noise down (= be quiet) .

data.chText: 不使（胃中食物）吐出；不呕吐
data.enText: to not bring sth back through the mouth from the stomach; to not vomit

data.chText: 她喝了点儿水，但一吃东西就吐。
data.enText: She's had some water but she can't keep any food down.
keep from sth
keep yourself from sth

data.chText: 忍住（或克制自己）不做某事
data.enText: to prevent yourself from doing sth

data.chText: 她差一点儿笑了出来。
data.enText: She could hardly keep from laughing.

data.chText: 我差一点儿没摔倒。
data.enText: I just managed to keep myself from falling.
keep sb from sth

data.chText: 阻止（或防止、阻碍）某人做某事
data.enText: to prevent sb from doing sth

data.chText: 希望我没有妨碍你工作。
data.enText: I hope I'm not keeping you from your work.

data.chText: 教堂的钟声使我不能入睡。
data.enText: The church bells keep me from sleeping.
keep sth from sb

data.chText: 不将某事告诉某人；瞒着某人
data.enText: to avoid telling sb sth

data.chText: 我想我们应该等他身体好些再告诉他实情。
data.enText: I think we ought to keep the truth from him until he's better.
keep sth from sth

data.chText: 使置于某物之外；使与某物分开
data.enText: to make sth stay out of sth

data.chText: 她无法使自己沉重的心情不流露在话音之中。
data.enText: She could not keep the dismay from her voice.
keep in with sb

data.chText: （为得到好处而）与某人友好相处，不得罪某人
data.enText: to make sure that you stay friendly with sb, because you will get an advantage from doing so
keep sth↔in

data.chText: 控制（或抑制）感情
data.enText: to avoid expressing an emotion

data.chText: 他几乎控制不住自己的愤怒。
data.enText: He could scarcely keep in his indignation.
keep sb in

data.chText: 使某人留在室内（或某地）；使不外出
data.enText: to make sb stay indoors or in a particular place
keep sb/yourself in sth

data.chText: 向某人经常供应（或正常提供）某物
data.enText: to provide sb/yourself with a regular supply of sth
keep off

data.chText: （雨、雪等）未下
data.enText: if rain, snow, etc. keeps off , it does not fall
keep off sth

data.chText: 避免吃（或喝、吸）某物
data.enText: to avoid eating, drinking or smoking sth

data.chText: 我尽量不吃高脂肪食物。
data.enText: I'm trying to keep off fatty foods.

data.chText: 回避某话题
data.enText: to avoid mentioning a particular subject

data.chText: 我父亲在场时最好不要谈论政治。
data.enText: It's best to keep off politics when my father's around.
keep sb/sth↔off
keep sb/sth off sb/sth

data.chText: 使…不接近（或不接触、远离）某人 / 事物
data.enText: to prevent sb/sth from coming near, touching, etc. sb/sth

data.chText: 他们点燃篝火防止野兽靠近。
data.enText: They lit a fire to keep off wild animals.

data.chText: 别碰我！
data.enText: Keep your hands off (= do not touch) me!
keep on

data.chText: 继续
data.enText: to continue

data.chText: 一直往前走到教堂。
data.enText: Keep on until you get to the church.
keep sb↔on

data.chText: 继续雇用某人
data.enText: to continue to employ sb
keep sth on

data.chText: 继续租用房子（或套房等）
data.enText: to continue to rent a house, flat/apartment, etc.
keep on (at sb) (about sb/sth)

data.chText: （对…）纠缠不休；老是困扰；老是唠叨
data.enText: to speak to sb often and in an annoying way about sb/sth

data.chText: 他就是这样纠缠不休！
data.enText: He does keep on so!

data.chText: 我会做的——可别再对我唠叨了！
data.enText: I'll do it─just don't keep on at me about it!
keep out (of sth)

data.chText: 不进入；留在外面
data.enText: to not enter a place; to stay outside

data.chText: 告示牌上写着“私人产业——不得入内！”
data.enText: The sign said ‘Private Property─Keep Out!’
keep sb/sth↔out (of sth)

data.chText: 使不进入；防止进入；把…关在外面
data.enText: to prevent sb/sth from entering a place

data.chText: 别让那狗进我的书房！
data.enText: Keep that dog out of my study!
keep out of sth
keep sb out of sth

data.chText: 避免某事；使不卷入某事；使置身于…之外；使不受…的影响
data.enText: to avoid sth; to prevent sb from being involved in sth or affected by sth

data.chText: 那孩子非捣蛋不可。
data.enText: That child can't keep out of mischief.

data.chText: 别让孩子晒着。
data.enText: Keep the baby out of the sun.
keep to sth

data.chText: 不偏离（或不离开）道路等
data.enText: to avoid leaving a path, road, etc.

data.chText: 顺着道儿走——这一带到处是沼泽地。
data.enText: Keep to the track─the land is very boggy around here.

data.chText: 不偏离主题；不跑题
data.enText: to talk or write only about the subject that you are supposed to talk or write about

data.chText: 最烦人的就是那些谈话不着边际的人。
data.enText: Nothing is more irritating than people who do not keep to the point .

data.chText: 遵守（或信守、履行）诺言
data.enText: to do what you have promised or agreed to do

data.chText: 遵守协议；信守承诺；执行计划
data.enText: to keep to an agreement/an undertaking/a plan

data.chText: 坚守，不离开（某地或某个位置）
data.enText: to stay in and not leave a particular place or position

data.chText: 她快90岁了，大部分时间都待在房间里。
data.enText: She's nearly 90 and mostly keeps to her room.
keep (yourself) to yourself

data.chText: 离群索居；不与人往来；不管别人的事
data.enText: to avoid meeting people socially or becoming involved in their affairs

data.chText: 谁对他都不太了解，因为他很少和人交往。
data.enText: Nobody knows much about him; he keeps himself very much to himself.
keep sth to yourself

data.chText: 对…秘而不宣（或保守秘密）；不将…说出去
data.enText: to not tell other people about sth

data.chText: 你要是不把这消息传出去，我会不胜感激的。
data.enText: I'd be grateful if you kept this information to yourself.
keep sb under

data.chText: 控制，压制（人）
data.enText: to control or oppress sb

data.chText: 当地居民受军队管制。
data.enText: The local people are kept under by the army.
keep up

data.chText: （天气）持续不变
data.enText: if particular weather keeps up , it continues without stopping

data.chText: 雨下了整整一个下午。
data.enText: The rain kept up all afternoon.
keep up (with sb/sth)

data.chText: （与…）齐步前进，并驾齐驱；跟上
data.enText: to move, make progress or increase at the same rate as sb/sth

data.chText: 慢点——我跟不上了！
data.enText: Slow down─I can't keep up!

data.chText: 我并非所有的变化都能跟得上。
data.enText: I can't keep up with all the changes.

data.chText: 工资赶不上通货膨胀。
data.enText: Wages are not keeping up with inflation.
keep up with sb

data.chText: 与（某人）保持联系
data.enText: to continue to be in contact with sb

data.chText: 你与多少老同学保持着联系？
data.enText: How many of your old school friends do you keep up with?
keep up with sth

data.chText: 熟悉，了解（消息、形势等）
data.enText: to learn about or be aware of the news, current events, etc.

data.chText: 她喜欢赶时髦。
data.enText: She likes to keep up with the latest fashions.

data.chText: 继续支付；继续做
data.enText: to continue to pay or do sth regularly

data.chText: 如果你不继续付款，你的住房就可能保不住了。
data.enText: If you do not keep up with the payments you could lose your home.
keep sb up

data.chText: 使某人熬夜（或开夜车、不睡觉）
data.enText: to prevent sb from going to bed

data.chText: 希望我们没有耽误你睡觉。
data.enText: I hope we're not keeping you up.
keep sth↔up

data.chText: 使某事物保持在高水平
data.enText: to make sth stay at a high level

data.chText: 昂贵的原料费用使价格居高不下。
data.enText: The high cost of raw materials is keeping prices up.

data.chText: 使某事物保持（在同一水平，通常指高水平）
data.enText: to continue sth at the same, usually high, level

data.chText: 敌人昼夜不停地狂轰滥炸。
data.enText: The enemy kept up the bombardment day and night.

data.chText: 我们难以继续偿还按揭贷款。
data.enText: We're having difficulty keeping up our mortgage payments.

data.chText: 干得好！继续好好干吧！
data.enText: Well done! Keep up the good work/Keep it up !

data.chText: 使处于高水平；使不低落
data.enText: to make sth remain at a high level

data.chText: 他们唱歌以保持高昂的情绪。
data.enText: They sang songs to keep their spirits up.

data.chText: 沿用（或沿袭、保持）某事物
data.enText: to continue to use or practise sth

data.chText: 保持老传统
data.enText: to keep up old traditions

data.chText: 你还坚持说西班牙语吗？
data.enText: Do you still keep up your Spanish?

data.chText: 保养，维护（房屋、花园等）
data.enText: to take care of a house, garden/yard, etc. so that it stays in good condition

data.chText: 生活必需品；生活费用
data.enText: food, clothes and all the other things that a person needs to live; the cost of these things

data.chText: 你该找个工作挣自己的生活费了。
data.enText: It's about time you got a job to earn your keep .

data.chText: 城堡主楼
data.enText: a large strong tower, built as part of an old castle
for keeps

data.chText: 永远；永久
data.enText: for ever

data.chText: 这东西是永远属于你了，还是要还给他？
data.enText: Is it yours for keeps or does he want it back?
earn your keep

data.chText: 挣口饭吃；为有栖身之处而工作
data.enText: to do useful or helpful things in return for being allowed to live or stay somewhere

data.chText: 值得所花的时间（或金钱）
data.enText: to be worth the amount of time or money that is being spent

data.chText: 他认为他不应再得到那么高的薪金了。他根本不配拿那么多钱。
data.enText: He felt he no longer deserved such a high salary. He just wasn't earning his keep.

means: 开设，经营，管理（商店或餐馆）

ex.enText: She kept walking in the garden.
The boy kept asking me questions.

synonyms.bx: 指继续做之前所做的某事或重复做同一件事。

ex.chText: 这个婴儿一晚上都在哭。
ex.enText: The baby continued to cry all night.
He continued to work after he recovered.

ex.chText: 晚饭后我们继续下国际象棋如何？
ex.enText: Shall we continue playing chess after supper?

synonyms.bx: 指持续而不停止，也可指中断后又继续下去。

ex.chText: 噪声24个小时没有消停过。
ex.enText: The noise went on for 24 hours.

ex.chText: 他不应该这样生活下去了。
ex.enText: He oughtn't to go on living this way.

ex.chText: 巴辛接着给我们讲了些别的东西。
ex.enText: Bassin went on to tell us something different.

synonyms.bx: 指不停顿地继续下去；go on doing sth 表示继续干同一件事，而 go on to do sth 则表示干完一件事后接着干另一件事。

ex.chText: 两天以后，他们继续旅行。
ex.enText: Two days later, they resumed their journey.

ex.chText: 幕间休息之后，那位小提琴手又重新开始演奏。
ex.enText: The violinist resumed playing after the intermission.

data.chText: 大多数含 keep 的习语，都可在该等习语中的名词及形容词相关词条找到，如 keep house 在词条 house 下。
data.enText: Most idioms containing keep are at the entries for the nouns and adjectives in the idioms, for example keep house is at house .
keep going

data.chText: （在身处困境或遭难时）尽力维持下去，坚持活下去
data.enText: to make an effort to live normally when you are in a difficult situation or when you have experienced great suffering

data.chText: 你只要让自己忙起来，就能坚持下去。
data.enText: You just have to keep yourself busy and keep going.

data.chText: （用于鼓励）继续下去，坚持下去
data.enText: used to encourage sb to continue doing sth

data.chText: 坚持下去，萨拉，你已经快到了。
data.enText: Keep going, Sarah, you're nearly there.
keep sb going

data.chText: 足以使某人维持（或支撑）
data.enText: to be enough for sb until they get what they are waiting for

data.chText: 吃个苹果就能挨到吃晚饭了。
data.enText: Have an apple to keep you going till dinner time.
for keeps

data.chText: 永远；永久
data.enText: for ever

data.chText: 这东西是永远属于你了，还是要还给他？
data.enText: Is it yours for keeps or does he want it back?
earn your keep

data.chText: 挣口饭吃；为有栖身之处而工作
data.enText: to do useful or helpful things in return for being allowed to live or stay somewhere

data.chText: 值得所花的时间（或金钱）
data.enText: to be worth the amount of time or money that is being spent

data.chText: 他认为他不应再得到那么高的薪金了。他根本不配拿那么多钱。
data.enText: He felt he no longer deserved such a high salary. He just wasn't earning his keep.
keep sb after
keep at sth

data.chText: 继续做某事（或坚持干）
data.enText: to continue working at sth

data.chText: 快，要坚持，你马上就要完成了！
data.enText: Come on, keep at it, you've nearly finished!
keep sb at sth

data.chText: 使某人继续做（或坚持干）某事
data.enText: to make sb continue working at sth

data.chText: 他让我们不停地干了一天。
data.enText: He kept us at it all day.
keep away (from sb/sth)

data.chText: 避免接近；远离；勿靠近
data.enText: to avoid going near sb/sth

data.chText: 切莫靠近悬崖边。
data.enText: Keep away from the edge of the cliff.
keep sb/sth away (from sb/sth)

data.chText: 不让接近某人（或某事物）；使离开
data.enText: to prevent sb/sth from going somewhere

data.chText: 她病得好几周都上不了班。
data.enText: Her illness kept her away from work for several weeks.
keep back (from sb/sth)

data.chText: （与…）保持距离
data.enText: to stay at a distance from sb/sth

data.chText: 离公路远些。
data.enText: Keep well back from the road.
keep sb↔back
keep sb after

data.chText: 罚（学生）课后留校
data.enText: to make a student stay at school after normal hours as a punishment

data.chText: 使（学生）留级
data.enText: to make a student repeat a year at school because of poor marks/grades
keep sb↔back (from sb/sth)

data.chText: 使某人（与…）保持距离
data.enText: to make sb stay at a distance from sb/sth

data.chText: 设置了障碍，使人群无法靠近。
data.enText: Barricades were erected to keep back the crowds.
keep sth↔back

data.chText: 抑制（或阻止）感情等的流露
data.enText: to prevent a feeling, etc. from being expressed

data.chText: 她无法忍住泪水。
data.enText: She was unable to keep back her tears.

data.chText: 保留（或扣留）某物的一部分
data.enText: to continue to have a part of sth

data.chText: 他把那笔钱扣下了一半。
data.enText: He kept back half the money for himself.
keep sth↔back (from sb)

data.chText: 拒绝告知某事；隐瞒
data.enText: to refuse to tell sb sth

data.chText: 我肯定她有什么事瞒着我们。
data.enText: I'm sure she's keeping something back from us.
keep down

data.chText: 隐蔽；隐伏；卧倒；蹲下
data.enText: to hide yourself by not standing up straight

data.chText: 蹲下！一定不要让人看见你。
data.enText: Keep down! You mustn't let anyone see you.
keep sb↔down

data.chText: 压制（或限制、控制）某人
data.enText: to prevent a person, group, etc. from expressing themselves freely

data.chText: 多年来人们一直受到残暴统治的压制。
data.enText: The people have been kept down for years by a brutal regime.
keep sth↔down

data.chText: 使保持在低水平；抑制某事物的增长
data.enText: to make sth stay at a low level; to avoid increasing sth

data.chText: 保持低工资 / 物价 / 生活费用
data.enText: to keep down wages/prices/the cost of living

data.chText: 小声点——别让人听见。
data.enText: Keep your voice down─I don't want anyone else to hear.

data.chText: 小声点儿。
data.enText: Keep the noise down (= be quiet) .

data.chText: 不使（胃中食物）吐出；不呕吐
data.enText: to not bring sth back through the mouth from the stomach; to not vomit

data.chText: 她喝了点儿水，但一吃东西就吐。
data.enText: She's had some water but she can't keep any food down.
keep from sth
keep yourself from sth

data.chText: 忍住（或克制自己）不做某事
data.enText: to prevent yourself from doing sth

data.chText: 她差一点儿笑了出来。
data.enText: She could hardly keep from laughing.

data.chText: 我差一点儿没摔倒。
data.enText: I just managed to keep myself from falling.
keep sb from sth

data.chText: 阻止（或防止、阻碍）某人做某事
data.enText: to prevent sb from doing sth

data.chText: 希望我没有妨碍你工作。
data.enText: I hope I'm not keeping you from your work.

data.chText: 教堂的钟声使我不能入睡。
data.enText: The church bells keep me from sleeping.
keep sth from sb

data.chText: 不将某事告诉某人；瞒着某人
data.enText: to avoid telling sb sth

data.chText: 我想我们应该等他身体好些再告诉他实情。
data.enText: I think we ought to keep the truth from him until he's better.
keep sth from sth

data.chText: 使置于某物之外；使与某物分开
data.enText: to make sth stay out of sth

data.chText: 她无法使自己沉重的心情不流露在话音之中。
data.enText: She could not keep the dismay from her voice.
keep in with sb

data.chText: （为得到好处而）与某人友好相处，不得罪某人
data.enText: to make sure that you stay friendly with sb, because you will get an advantage from doing so
keep sth↔in

data.chText: 控制（或抑制）感情
data.enText: to avoid expressing an emotion

data.chText: 他几乎控制不住自己的愤怒。
data.enText: He could scarcely keep in his indignation.
keep sb in

data.chText: 使某人留在室内（或某地）；使不外出
data.enText: to make sb stay indoors or in a particular place
keep sb/yourself in sth

data.chText: 向某人经常供应（或正常提供）某物
data.enText: to provide sb/yourself with a regular supply of sth
keep off

data.chText: （雨、雪等）未下
data.enText: if rain, snow, etc. keeps off , it does not fall
keep off sth

data.chText: 避免吃（或喝、吸）某物
data.enText: to avoid eating, drinking or smoking sth

data.chText: 我尽量不吃高脂肪食物。
data.enText: I'm trying to keep off fatty foods.

data.chText: 回避某话题
data.enText: to avoid mentioning a particular subject

data.chText: 我父亲在场时最好不要谈论政治。
data.enText: It's best to keep off politics when my father's around.
keep sb/sth↔off
keep sb/sth off sb/sth

data.chText: 使…不接近（或不接触、远离）某人 / 事物
data.enText: to prevent sb/sth from coming near, touching, etc. sb/sth

data.chText: 他们点燃篝火防止野兽靠近。
data.enText: They lit a fire to keep off wild animals.

data.chText: 别碰我！
data.enText: Keep your hands off (= do not touch) me!
keep on

data.chText: 继续
data.enText: to continue

data.chText: 一直往前走到教堂。
data.enText: Keep on until you get to the church.
keep sb↔on

data.chText: 继续雇用某人
data.enText: to continue to employ sb
keep sth on

data.chText: 继续租用房子（或套房等）
data.enText: to continue to rent a house, flat/apartment, etc.
keep on (at sb) (about sb/sth)

data.chText: （对…）纠缠不休；老是困扰；老是唠叨
data.enText: to speak to sb often and in an annoying way about sb/sth

data.chText: 他就是这样纠缠不休！
data.enText: He does keep on so!

data.chText: 我会做的——可别再对我唠叨了！
data.enText: I'll do it─just don't keep on at me about it!
keep out (of sth)

data.chText: 不进入；留在外面
data.enText: to not enter a place; to stay outside

data.chText: 告示牌上写着“私人产业——不得入内！”
data.enText: The sign said ‘Private Property─Keep Out!’
keep sb/sth↔out (of sth)

data.chText: 使不进入；防止进入；把…关在外面
data.enText: to prevent sb/sth from entering a place

data.chText: 别让那狗进我的书房！
data.enText: Keep that dog out of my study!
keep out of sth
keep sb out of sth

data.chText: 避免某事；使不卷入某事；使置身于…之外；使不受…的影响
data.enText: to avoid sth; to prevent sb from being involved in sth or affected by sth

data.chText: 那孩子非捣蛋不可。
data.enText: That child can't keep out of mischief.

data.chText: 别让孩子晒着。
data.enText: Keep the baby out of the sun.
keep to sth

data.chText: 不偏离（或不离开）道路等
data.enText: to avoid leaving a path, road, etc.

data.chText: 顺着道儿走——这一带到处是沼泽地。
data.enText: Keep to the track─the land is very boggy around here.

data.chText: 不偏离主题；不跑题
data.enText: to talk or write only about the subject that you are supposed to talk or write about

data.chText: 最烦人的就是那些谈话不着边际的人。
data.enText: Nothing is more irritating than people who do not keep to the point .

data.chText: 遵守（或信守、履行）诺言
data.enText: to do what you have promised or agreed to do

data.chText: 遵守协议；信守承诺；执行计划
data.enText: to keep to an agreement/an undertaking/a plan

data.chText: 坚守，不离开（某地或某个位置）
data.enText: to stay in and not leave a particular place or position

data.chText: 她快90岁了，大部分时间都待在房间里。
data.enText: She's nearly 90 and mostly keeps to her room.
keep (yourself) to yourself

data.chText: 离群索居；不与人往来；不管别人的事
data.enText: to avoid meeting people socially or becoming involved in their affairs

data.chText: 谁对他都不太了解，因为他很少和人交往。
data.enText: Nobody knows much about him; he keeps himself very much to himself.
keep sth to yourself

data.chText: 对…秘而不宣（或保守秘密）；不将…说出去
data.enText: to not tell other people about sth

data.chText: 你要是不把这消息传出去，我会不胜感激的。
data.enText: I'd be grateful if you kept this information to yourself.
keep sb under

data.chText: 控制，压制（人）
data.enText: to control or oppress sb

data.chText: 当地居民受军队管制。
data.enText: The local people are kept under by the army.
keep up

data.chText: （天气）持续不变
data.enText: if particular weather keeps up , it continues without stopping

data.chText: 雨下了整整一个下午。
data.enText: The rain kept up all afternoon.
keep up (with sb/sth)

data.chText: （与…）齐步前进，并驾齐驱；跟上
data.enText: to move, make progress or increase at the same rate as sb/sth

data.chText: 慢点——我跟不上了！
data.enText: Slow down─I can't keep up!

data.chText: 我并非所有的变化都能跟得上。
data.enText: I can't keep up with all the changes.

data.chText: 工资赶不上通货膨胀。
data.enText: Wages are not keeping up with inflation.
keep up with sb

data.chText: 与（某人）保持联系
data.enText: to continue to be in contact with sb

data.chText: 你与多少老同学保持着联系？
data.enText: How many of your old school friends do you keep up with?
keep up with sth

data.chText: 熟悉，了解（消息、形势等）
data.enText: to learn about or be aware of the news, current events, etc.

data.chText: 她喜欢赶时髦。
data.enText: She likes to keep up with the latest fashions.

data.chText: 继续支付；继续做
data.enText: to continue to pay or do sth regularly

data.chText: 如果你不继续付款，你的住房就可能保不住了。
data.enText: If you do not keep up with the payments you could lose your home.
keep sb up

data.chText: 使某人熬夜（或开夜车、不睡觉）
data.enText: to prevent sb from going to bed

data.chText: 希望我们没有耽误你睡觉。
data.enText: I hope we're not keeping you up.
keep sth↔up

data.chText: 使某事物保持在高水平
data.enText: to make sth stay at a high level

data.chText: 昂贵的原料费用使价格居高不下。
data.enText: The high cost of raw materials is keeping prices up.

data.chText: 使某事物保持（在同一水平，通常指高水平）
data.enText: to continue sth at the same, usually high, level

data.chText: 敌人昼夜不停地狂轰滥炸。
data.enText: The enemy kept up the bombardment day and night.

data.chText: 我们难以继续偿还按揭贷款。
data.enText: We're having difficulty keeping up our mortgage payments.

data.chText: 干得好！继续好好干吧！
data.enText: Well done! Keep up the good work/Keep it up !

data.chText: 使处于高水平；使不低落
data.enText: to make sth remain at a high level

data.chText: 他们唱歌以保持高昂的情绪。
data.enText: They sang songs to keep their spirits up.

data.chText: 沿用（或沿袭、保持）某事物
data.enText: to continue to use or practise sth

data.chText: 保持老传统
data.enText: to keep up old traditions

data.chText: 你还坚持说西班牙语吗？
data.enText: Do you still keep up your Spanish?

data.chText: 保养，维护（房屋、花园等）
data.enText: to take care of a house, garden/yard, etc. so that it stays in good condition

trans: 使（数目、大小、数量等）保持在低水平；抑制…增长
对…纠缠不休；对…说个没完
跟上（活儿、人等）；同…做（或理解）得一样好

tr: a cell in a jail or prison
the main tower within the walls of a medieval castle or fortress
the financial means whereby one lives
example: each child was expected to pay for their keep
he applied to the state for support
he could no longer earn his own livelihood
preserved meats
keep potatoes fresh
The pianist kept time with the metronome
keep count
I cannot keep track of all my employees
keep a diary
maintain a record
keep notes
She alone sustained her family
The money will sustain our good cause
There's little to earn and many to keep
The student was kept after school
Can I keep my old stuffed animals?
She kept her maiden name after she married
He keeps the shop when I am gone
I keep a car in the countryside
She keeps an apartment in Paris for her shopping trips
I always keep batteries in the freezer
keep food for a week in the pantry
She keeps a sixpack and a week's worth of supplies in the refrigerator
Where do you keep your gardening tools?
keep my job for me while I give birth
keep my seat, please
keep open the possibility of a merger

tr: allow to remain in a place or position or maintain a property or feature
example: We cannot continue several servants any longer
She retains a lawyer
The family's fortune waned and they could not keep their household staff
Our grant has run out and we cannot keep you on
We kept the work going as long as we could
She retained her composure
this garment retains its shape even after many washings
suppress a smile
Keep your temper
keep your cool

tr: stop (someone or something) from doing something or being in a certain state
example: We must prevent the cancer from spreading
His snoring kept me from falling asleep
Keep the child from eating the marbles

tr: behave as expected during of holidays or rites
example: Keep the commandments
celebrate Christmas
Observe Yom Kippur

tr: conform one's action or practice to
example: keep appointments
she never keeps her promises
We kept to the original conditions of the contract
He is keeping three women in the guest cottage
keep boarders
She keeps a few chickens in the yard
he keeps bees

tr: keep in a certain state, position, or activity
example: hold in place
She always held herself as a lady
The students keep me on my toes

tr: continue a certain state, condition, or activity
example: Keep on working!
We continued to work into the night
Keep smiling
We went on working until well past midnight

tr: maintain in safety from injury, harm, or danger
example: May God keep you
These potatoes keep for a long time

value.def: If someone keeps or is kept in a particular state, they remain in it.

example.ex: The noise kept him awake...
example.tran: 噪音吵得他一直没有睡着。

example.ex: Reggie was being kept busy behind the bar...
example.tran: 雷吉一直在柜台后忙活。

example.ex: To keep warm they burnt wood in a rusty oil barrel...
example.tran: 他们在一只生锈的油桶里烧木柴来保暖。

example.ex: For several years I kept in touch with her.
example.tran: 几年来，我一直和她保持联系。

value.def: If you keep or you are kept in a particular position or place, you remain in it.

example.ex: Keep away from the doors while the train is moving...
example.tran: 列车运行过程中要远离车门。

example.ex: He kept his head down, hiding his features...
example.tran: 他低头掩面。

example.ex: It was against all orders to smoke, but a cigarette kept away mosquitoes...
example.tran: 吸烟违反所有规章，但香烟可以驱蚊。

example.ex: Doctors will keep her in hospital for at least another week.
example.tran: 医生会让她再住至少一个星期的院。

value.def: If you keep off something or keep away from it, you avoid it. If you keep out of something, you avoid getting involved in it. You can also say that you keep someone off ,away from or out of something.

example.ex: I managed to stick to the diet and keep off sweet foods...
example.tran: 我努力做到了只吃规定饮食，不沾甜食。

example.ex: He's going to be a fantastic player if he keeps away from booze and women...
example.tran: 如果能不近酒色，他将成为一名出色的运动员。

example.ex: The best way to keep babies off sugar is to go back to the natural diet and eat lots of fresh fruit.
example.tran: 避免婴儿摄入食糖的最好办法是让其回归自然的饮食，多吃新鲜水果。

value.def: If someone or something keeps you from a particular action, they prevent you from doing it.

example.ex: Embarrassment has kept me from doing all sorts of things...
example.tran: 我总是害怕受窘，什么事都不敢去做。

example.ex: He kept her from being lonely...
example.tran: 他不让她感到孤独。

example.ex: What can you do to keep it from happening again?
example.tran: 你怎样防止它再次发生？

value.def: If you try to keep from doing something, you try to stop yourself from doing it.

example.ex: She bit her lip to keep from crying...
example.tran: 她咬住嘴唇不哭。

example.ex: He had to lean on Dan to keep from falling.
example.tran: 他不得不靠在丹身上以免摔倒。

value.def: If you keep something from someone, you do not tell them about it.

example.ex: She knew that Gabriel was keeping something from her.
example.tran: 她知道加布里埃尔有事瞒着她。

value.def: If you keep doing something, you do it repeatedly or continue to do it.

example.ex: I keep forgetting it's December...
example.tran: 我总是忘了现在是12月了。

example.ex: I turned back after a while, but he kept walking...
example.tran: 我过了一会就往回走了，但他还接着走。

example.ex: Did he give up or keep on trying?...
example.tran: 他是放弃了还是在继续努力？

example.ex: My wife keeps on saying that I work too hard.
example.tran: 我妻子总说我工作太辛苦了。

value.def: Keep is used with some nouns to indicate that someone does something for a period of time or continues to do it. For example, if you keep a grip on something, you continue to hold or control it.

example.ex: Until last year, the regime kept a tight grip on the country...
example.tran: 直到去年，那个国家还处于该政权的严密控制之下。

example.ex: One of them would keep a look-out on the road behind to warn us of approaching vehicles...
example.tran: 他们中会有一人看着后面的路，提醒我们注意过来的车辆。

example.ex: His parents kept a vigil by his bedside as he was given brain and body scans.
example.tran: 在他做脑扫描和全身扫描时，他的父母守护在他床边。

value.tran: （与某些名词连用，表示持续一段时间或继续做某事）持续，继续（持有或控制）

value.def: If you keep something, you continue to have it in your possession and do not throw it away, give it away, or sell it.

example.ex: 'I like this dress,' she said. 'Keep it. You can have it,' said Daphne...
example.tran: “我喜欢这件连衣裙，”她说。“留下吧。给你了，”达夫妮说道。

example.ex: Lathan had to choose between marrying her and keeping his job.
example.tran: 莱森不得不在娶她和保住工作之间作出选择。

value.def: If you keep something in a particular place, you always have it or store it in that place so that you can use it whenever you need it.

example.ex: She kept her money under the mattress...
example.tran: 她把钱放在床垫下。

example.ex: She remembered where she kept the gun...
example.tran: 她记得放枪的地方。

example.ex: To make it easier to contact us, keep this card handy.
example.tran: 把这张卡放在手边，以便于和我们联系。

value.def: When you keep something such as a promise or an appointment, you do what you said you would do.

example.ex: I'm hoping you'll keep your promise to come for a long visit...
example.tran: 我希望你遵守诺言来这儿多呆几天。

example.ex: He had again failed to keep his word.
example.tran: 他又食言了。

value.def: If you keep a record of a series of events, you write down details of it so that they can be referred to later.

example.ex: Eleanor began to keep a diary...
example.tran: 埃莉诺开始记日记了。

example.ex: The volunteers kept a record of everything they ate for a week.
example.tran: 志愿者记录下他们一周所吃的所有食物。

value.def: If you keep yourself or keep someone else, you support yourself or the other person by earning enough money to provide food, clothing, money, and other necessary things.

example.ex: She could just about afford to keep her five kids...
example.tran: 她勉勉强强能养得起自己的5个孩子。

example.ex: I just cannot afford to keep myself...
example.tran: 我难以维持生计。

example.ex: The pay was enough to keep him in whisky for a day or two.
example.tran: 这笔钱够他喝一两天威士忌了。

value.def: Someone's keep is the cost of food and other things that they need in their daily life.

example.ex: Ray will earn his keep on local farms while studying...
example.tran: 雷求学期间会在当地的农场干活赚取生活费。

example.ex: I need to give my parents money for my keep.
example.tran: 我需要付给父母我的生活费。

value.def: If you keep animals, you own them and take care of them.

example.ex: I've brought you some eggs. We keep chickens...
example.tran: 我给你带了些鸡蛋。我们养鸡。

example.ex: This mad writer kept a lobster as a pet.
example.tran: 这个疯狂的作家把龙虾当宠物养。

value.def: If you keep a business such as a small shop or hotel, you own it and manage it.

example.ex: His father kept a village shop.
example.tran: 他父亲经营一家乡村商店。

value.def: If someone or something keeps you, they delay you and make you late.

example.ex: Sorry to keep you, Jack...
example.tran: 很抱歉让你久等了，杰克。

example.ex: 'What kept you?' — 'I went in the wrong direction.'
example.tran: “你为什么晚了？”——“我走错了方向。”

value.def: If food keeps for a certain length of time, it stays fresh and suitable to eat for that time.

example.ex: Whatever is left over may be put into the refrigerator, where it will keep for 2-3 weeks.
example.tran: 剩下的东西都可以放进冰箱，可以保持两到三个星期不坏。

value.def: You can say or ask how someone is keeping as a way of saying or asking whether they are well.

example.ex: She hasn't been keeping too well lately...
example.tran: 她最近身体不太好。

example.ex: How are you keeping these days?
example.tran: 你这些天身体怎么样？

value.tran: （用于询问健康状况）保持健康

value.def: A keep is the main tower of a medieval castle, in which people lived.
If you keep at it, you continue doing something that you have started, even if you are tired and would prefer to stop.

example.ex: It may take a number of attempts, but it is worth keeping at it...
example.tran: 可能要试几次，但还是值得坚持的。

example.ex: 'Keep at it!' Thade encouraged me.
example.tran: “坚持下去！”萨德鼓励我道。

value.def: Something that is for keeps is permanent and will not change.

example.ex: Ensure that whatever you gain now will be for keeps...
example.tran: 确保你现在所获得的一切永远不会失去。

example.ex: He advised them to leave town for keeps.
example.tran: 他建议他们离开镇子，永远别再回来。

value.def: If you keep going, you continue moving along or doing something that you have started, even if you are tired and would prefer to stop.

example.ex: She forced herself to keep going...
example.tran: 她强迫自己继续下去。

example.ex: I was shouting: 'Keep going, keep going!'
example.tran: 我喊着：“坚持，坚持！”

value.def: If one thing is in keeping with another, it is suitable in relation to that thing. If one thing is out of keeping with another, it is not suitable in relation to that thing.

example.ex: His office was in keeping with his station and experience...
example.tran: 他的办公室与其身份和阅历相称。

example.ex: In keeping with tradition, the Emperor and Empress did not attend the ceremony...
example.tran: 按照传统，皇帝和皇后未参加该仪式。

example.ex: His own response to it seemed to be out of keeping with his earlier expressed opinions.
example.tran: 他自己对此的反应与其早前表达的看法并不一致。

gramarinfo.label: v-link PHR, PHR with cl, oft PHR <l>with</l> n

value.tran: 协调/不协调;一致/不一致

value.def: If you keep it up, you continue working or trying as hard as you have been in the past.

example.ex: There are fears that he will not be able to keep it up when he gets to the particularly demanding third year...
example.tran: 有人担心他到了要求极其严格的第3年时会坚持不下去。

example.ex: You're doing a great job! Keep it up!
example.tran: 你们干得非常棒！继续好好干吧！

value.def: If you keep something to yourself, you do not tell anyone else about it.

example.ex: I have to tell someone. I can't keep it to myself...
example.tran: 我得找人说说。我心里憋不住。

example.ex: There's one thing you can do for me. But keep it to yourself.
example.tran: 有件事你能帮我做。但你要保密。

value.tran: 把…秘而不宣；不将…说出去

value.def: If you keep yourself to yourself or keep to yourself, you stay on your own most of the time and do not mix socially with other people.

example.ex: He was a quiet man who kept himself to himself...
example.tran: 他是个喜欢安静、不爱与人来往的人。

example.ex: Since she knows little Italian, she keeps to herself.
example.tran: 因为不怎么懂意大利语，她很少和人交往。

trans: （使）留在家里；（罚学生）放学后留校；抑制
跟上；（与…）齐步前进；不落后（于…）；同…做（或理解）得一样好；了解；熟悉；继续做（或提供）；使不减少（或降低）
跟上；不落人之后；对…消息灵通；保持接触
保持联系；保持联络；再联系
远离，远离；（使）不接近；（使）缺席
不交际；保守秘密；杜门不出
色特西西小粘心；永不停顿；继续努力
永不止步（安踏的广告宣传语）；勇往直前（专辑名）
（使）在…外；（使）不入…内；（使…）置身于…之外
跟上；（使）保持与…并列；了解…的最新情况
